name: Ihsan Faridi
summary: Full Stack Developer specializing in AI-Powered & Frontend-First Applications | Turning Ideas into Scalable Products. 7+ years of experience building modern web applications using React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Python, and AI technologies. Proven track record of leading development teams, architecting scalable solutions, and delivering high-quality products. Passionate about mentoring developers and driving technical excellence.

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.summary: Leading full-stack development initiatives at NybleCraft, specializing in AI-powered applications and frontend-first architecture. Architecting and delivering scalable products that drive business value. Working remotely from Sydney, Australia, collaborating with international teams to build innovative solutions.
highlights: Architected and developed AI-powered full-stack applications using Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js
Designed and implemented scalable backend services with Python, FastAPI, and microservices architecture
Integrated cutting-edge AI technologies (ChatGPT, Cursor AI) to enhance application capabilities and developer productivity
Led technical decision-making for frontend architecture, ensuring optimal performance and user experience
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to maintain high code quality standards
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver products on time and within scope
Managed version control workflows and CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions
Optimized application performance and scalability, handling high-traffic scenarios

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.summary: Led full-stack development projects as a senior developer, specializing in React.js, Next.js, and Python-based backend solutions. Architected and delivered AI-integrated applications using FastAPI and modern frontend frameworks, driving technical excellence and innovation.
highlights: Architected and developed modern web applications using React.js and Next.js with TypeScript
Designed and built scalable RESTful APIs and backend services using Python and FastAPI
Integrated AI capabilities into web applications, enhancing user experience and functionality
Led technical architecture decisions for scalable full-stack solutions
Managed end-to-end development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to deployment
Collaborated with stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical solutions
Optimized application performance and implemented best practices for code maintainability

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.summary: Served as Web Developer Fundamental Mentor, teaching and mentoring students in web development fundamentals including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js. Provided comprehensive one-on-one guidance on industry-standard tools and best practices, building strong foundations for future developers.
highlights: Conducted one-on-one mentoring sessions teaching HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js fundamentals
Provided expert guidance on industry-standard tools including GitHub, Visual Studio Code, Figma, and Firebase hosting
Developed and delivered comprehensive curriculum and learning materials for web development
Fostered strong foundation in web design principles, emphasizing best practices and modern techniques
Inspired creativity and problem-solving skills in students through hands-on projects
Mentored students from beginner to intermediate level, preparing them for professional development roles
